CustomAlerts.PluginDescription: The Alerts plugin lets you define custom Alerts on almost every metric available in Piwik.
CustomAlerts.AlertDoesNotExist: Alert with ID %d does not exist!
CustomAlerts.AccessException: You are not the owner of the Alert with ID %d
CustomAlerts.SendEmail: Email me when this alert is triggered
CustomAlerts.ReportOrMetricIsInvalid: The report or metric given is invalid!
CustomAlerts.MailText: The custom alerts you requested from Piwik Alerts are listed in the table below. To see more details or to adjust your custom alert settings, please sign in to your Piwik Open Source Analytics account and access the Alerts page.
CustomAlerts.NoAlertsDefined: You haven't created any Alerts for this site yet, create one now!
CustomAlerts.CancelAndReturnToAlerts: Cancel and %sreturn to the list of alerts%s
